 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶפְעֶה‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==a kind of viper== ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]] 'a flando et sibilando;' compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***viper***, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> [[Isa.30.6|Isa 30:6]]; [[Isa.59.5|Isa 59:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשׁוֺן א‎</span> [[Job.20.16|Job 20:16]].
